alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland; Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 3:22PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Midland, Bay and Saginaw Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates are expected to peak in excess of one inch per hour this evening with steady snow continuing into tonight. Snowfall totals could approach 12 inches across the most northern portions of Midland and Bay Counties by Saturday afternoon. Strong winds are expected late tonight into Saturday with gusts of up to 45 mph as arctic air filters in behind the system sending wind chill values close to zero.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
